thread.section_title: Marvin.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marvin.ie | marvin.ie
thread.title: Luiza

author: Luiza
title: Luiza
text: Marvin has pretty much all the same takeaways as its biggest competitor (at least for my address), but with some cool features to improve the experience of takeaway ordering. Loyalty cards, different payment options (even PayPal and Bitcoin!), the ability to donate food for the homeless... I only wish the fee for PayPal payment was smaller, but I understand why it is that high (currently at â‚¬1.50)
